post.body: connections with new friends are often fun and rewarding - I truly enjoy Tweets!
Anyone on my list who wants to help Jenny out --- go Follow her - she's gotta have SNAP to rule the world... Go on now... :)
I have an evil twin (my alter-ego) but we could be triplets? I'm game - what do you have planned??? Perhaps I could tell MTC
I'd say we're competing for the same position. I love the idea of ruling the world from my cozy office! Tweet away!!!
- as a tax accountant during the first three months of every year, I'll second that... But I was meaning MARKETING LOL
and taking over the world is so easy to do... Consider the pleasure you'll gain from ruling all those unruly peeps?
Anybody here ever heard "Anything Goes" radio show on KLMR - Lamar Colorado radio - DM me.
Listening to Ty Harmon's morning show on the radio --- Eric is missing!!! New Year's VACATION already?
Article Marketing Rocks!!! I'm writing, I'm writing, the Article Marketing Rock!!! LOL - laughter break courtesy of http://janverhoeff.com
Looking for a lawyer to interview for a class assignment - due Monday. Any takers? It can be email?
Hummm finding a winter background that doesn't remind me of Christmas... I think I like the ice crystals.. Loving the season.
Listening to my mom tell me story #4 about what happened at work this week. Lois, you must be a real dream boss!!! Happy New Year - again!
Writer's Group will be having Black Eyed Peas for the spread of wealth in the new year at the home of http://orisgeorge.com tonight.
Happy New Year posting at http://janverhoeff.com --- Give it back, because you can't out give God! Enjoy...
Happy New Year Twitter! My great words of wisdom for the New Year are --- Go out and get yourself noticed!
YAY hooo!!! I'm at 1003 followers - for the new year. This is awesome! I made my goal within hours of the new year and on January 1. Whoooho

Hummm - I missed my goal by 18 followers... Perhaps by morning?
I'm off to bed. It's going to be a wonderful year!!! Hugs to ALL.
I'm taking off for a bit - but will be back later for the midnight surge. Happy New Year!!!
I have only 73 to go --- Gosh guys, this stuff is fun! Not only do I post twitter, but when I post ezines, they post to twitter. Interesting
Happy New Year http://aweber.com/b/1z7cZ
